item.title: CBN To Prosecute People Who Spray Naira Notes At Parties
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has announced its plan to prosecute anyone found spraying naira notes at social events such as weddings, burial ceremonies and others. In a statement on Tuesday signed by its spokesman, Osita Nwanisobi, the apex bank described the act as an “unpatriotic practice”, adding that it will be working with the Nigeria Police Force to arrest anyone found abusing the naira. The CBN stated that the statement was necessitated by the recent activities by those who flagrantly abuse the legal tender by spraying, dancing or matching on it at parties.

Naija News understands that the government’s order follows a fresh spike in the cases of COVID-19 pandemic in the country. The state government noted that the service restriction is targeted at safeguarding public health, hence, churches, mosques are only allowed to one service on worship days of Friday, Saturday and Sunday.

item.title: UK Remove Nigeria, Others From Red List
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The United Kingdom has announced it is scrapping the red list for international travel from 4am Wednesday, December 15. Naija News reports that this was made known by the Secretary of Health, Sajid Javid, in the House of Commons. According Javid, the travel red list for countries is no longer working in stopping the spread of new variant. “So I can announce today that whilst we’ll maintain our temporary testing measures for international travel, we will be removing all 11 countries from the travel red list effective from 4am tomorrow,” he said.

In a statement, signed by Emmanuel Abebe, on behalf of the Chairman of EDSIEC, the Commission said, “pursuant to section 21 of Edo State Local Government Electoral Law and the Edo State Independent Electoral Commission Establishment (Re-enactment) (Amendment 1) Law 2022, notice of Election is hereby given as follows: that election into the offices of the Chairmen and councilors for the 18 Local Government Councils in Edo State shall be held on Saturday, 14th January, 2023.

item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: A Saudi bound Kabo Air plane carrying 400 passengers from Kano made an emergency landing at the Sir Abubakar III international Airport in Sokoto early today. Earlier, Omo-Agege informed the lawmakers that President Buhari has submitted the revised 2022-2024 Medium Term Expenditure Framework MTEF and Fiscal Strategy Paper (FSP). In a letter addressed to the Senate, the President urged the lawmakers to approve the planning documents which he said would form the basis and assumptions in the 2022 budget.

item.title: Lagos State Says No Murder Was Involved, Acquits Five Students
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The Lagos State Government has stated that 12-year-old Sylvester Oromoni was not murdered, clearing the five students, employees and Dowen college of any foul play. The decision was made due to the legal advice of the Director of Public Prosecution, DPP, Ms. Adetutu Oshinusi, submitted to the Deputy Commissioner of Police, State Criminal Investigation Department, SCID and the trial magistrate, Magistrate Olatunbosun Adeola, The final autopsy report issued by the Lagos State University Teaching Hospital and toxicology report of post mortem samples and that of the Central Hospital, Warri, were in agreement as to the cause of death namely: Septicaemia, Lobar Pneumonia with Acute Pyelonephritis, Pyomyositis of the right ankle and Acute Bacteria Pneumonia due to severe Sepsis.

item.title: What is the meaning of Sapa? Get in on the popular Nigerian trend
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: What is the meaning of Sapa? Sapa is a Nigerian slang that has gained popularity in recent years. It describes situations where one doesn't have what one desire or needs. It is also often used in contexts where there is a sense of disappointment or sadness. The younger generation typically uses this slang as they are the ones who are most often affected by these situations. What does sapa mean? Sapa is a term used in Nigerian pidgin English to describe a state where one is being extremely broke or poor, usually after overspending.

item.title: Come Home And Invest - Soludo Woos Anambra Indigenes Residing In Lagos
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The Governor of Anambra State, Charles Soludo has urged Anambra indigenes residing in Lagos to return to the state and invest. item.title: Fans Think Shanice Is Katherine's New Love Interest on 'A Million Little Things' Are They Right?
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Who is Shanice on 'A Million Little Things'? The newest cast member to join the series has fans speculating that Katherine has a new love interest. Source: ABCLongtime fans of A Million Little Things will attest that Katherine (Grace Park) and Eddie’s (David Giuntoli) saga was a rollercoaster of emotions, to say the least. In addition to Eddie’s infidelity and his ongoing addiction to Vicodin, Katherine struggled with her feelings for Alan (Terry Chen).

item.title: How Many Children Did the Host Have?
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Late talk show host Jerry Springer became the subject of a viral hoax regarding his will and his kids. How many kids did he have? Let's discuss. The Gist: Jerry Springer and his ex-wife, Micki Velton, had one child together, Katie Springer, 47.A viral hoax had many believing Jerry had multiple children he kept private from the public.Katie is legally blind and deaf in one ear. It is believed that Jerry's daughter works with children with special needs.

item.title: Is Lilian Esoro back with Ubi Franklin?
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Yesterday 2nd February was Triple MG CEO, Ubi Franklin birthday and a birthday message by his estranged wife, Lilian Esoro is causing an uproar. The gorgeous actress and mother of one took to on Instagram to wish Ubi Franklin a happy birthday, and the tone of the message has got her fans talking. In about 2 hours after she posted the message, over 400 persons have commented and most of them think there is more to Lillian’s message than the eyes can see.

item.title: Kisumu residents defy MPs' directive on fish from China
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: - Kisumu residents go against their MPs' call to boycott fish imported from China – Chinese firm – Zhangzou Longyi Food Company Limited – has been selling imported tilapia in Kisumu for the last three months – The imported tilapia goes for as little as KSh 30 compared to locally sourced ones that are sold for at least KSh 100 Kisumu fish traders have defied their lawmakers's directive to boycott tilapia fish imported from China.

item.title: Navorro Bowman - Age, Family, Bio
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: NFL linebacker who was drafted by the San Francisco 49ers as the 91st overall pick in the 2010 NFL Draft. IN 2017 he became a free agent. Before Fame He was named to the All-Big Ten defensive team in 2008 while playing for Penn State. Trivia He was named a First-team All-Pro in 2011 and 2012. Family Life He was born in 1988 in District Heights, Maryland. Associated With He was trained by Patrick Willis while he played football at Penn State.

item.title: Nollywood Actress Doris Ogala Gets Juicy Appointment
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The Abia State Governor, Okezie Ikpeazu has appointed Nollywood actress, Doris Ogala as his Special Adviser. Naija News reports that the controversial actress took to her verified Instagram on Saturday to announce her new appointment, adding that she has ventured into politics. The actress, who is a close friend to Tonto Dikeh and seems to be following her footsteps by venturing into politics, disclosed that she has since received her appointment letter as a special adviser to the governor.

item.title: What Location Was the New CBS Original Movie, 'Fit For Christmas,' Filmed?
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The fitness coach from New York has to go back to her old home in Canada after her business dies. But where in Canada was it filmed? The new CBS Original movie, Fit For Christmas, is a feel-good movie about a fitness coach that's lost her business and love life in New York and is forced to return home to Canada to live with her family and try to rebuild. Written by and starring Amanda Kloots, the quirky fitness instructor has to fight with a handsome businessman scouting out places for a ski resort in order to make her dream of revitalizing the local community center to operate as a gym a reality.

item.title: What Marriage Means To Us Timi Dakolo and Wife Share Their Love Story
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Four years ago R ‘n’ B singer, Timi Dakolo walked down the aisle with his beautiful wife, Busola. Today, the marriage is blessed with 3 beautiful children. Recently, he featured his wife as the lead in the video of his hit song, ‘Iyawo Mi’ and the video that has got everyone talking. The couple, in an interview with Punch talked about how they met, settling differences, handle finances and what marriage means to them.

item.title: Why Nigerians Think A Cabal Is Controlling Buhari
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The presidency has again debunked the idea that there is a cabal within and outside the Aso Rock Villa controlling President Muhammadu Buhari. The Special Adviser to President Buhari on Media and Publicity, Femi Adesina ruled out the existence of any cabal in an opinion article on Thursday which highlighted and celebrated the attributes of the President as he celebrates his 79th birthday. The article titled ‘Buhari at 79: Lessons we’ve learnt from him‘ chronicled the leadership and personal attributes that can be learnt from the life of President Buhari.
